text: @allinwithchris @MSNBC I could not believe Kellyanne Conway said the coronavirus had been contained because of Donald Trump’s actions. That is both false and incredibly irresponsible. No-one anywhere in the world can say this has been contained yet. Specifically the WHO is not saying this. Not helpful!
